ARABIC: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضْلًا كَبِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Give good news to the muminun that they will receive immense favour from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Give glad tidings to the believers that there is great bounty for them from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Announce to the believers the good tidings that Allah has kept bounteous blessings in store for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Give glad news to the believers of their receiving great favor from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And give glad tidings to the believers that for them is Allah’s extreme munificence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And announce to the believers the glad tidings, that they will have from Allah a great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And give to the believers the good news that they shall have a great grace from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Give good tidings to the believers that there awaits them with God great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And announce unto the believers the good tidings that they will have great bounty from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Convey to the believers the good news that God has bounteous blessings in store for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And bear thou unto the believers the glad tidings that theirs is from Allah a great grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Announce to the faithful the good news that there will be for them a great grace from Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then give the Glad Tidings to the Believers, that they shall have from Allah a very great Bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And announce to the believers (in the Oneness of Allah and in His Messenger Muhammad SAW) the glad tidings, that they will have from Allah a Great Bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Give to the believers the glad tidings that with Allah there is for them a great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And give the believers the good news that for them is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allah great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:47] And give good tidings to the believers that there will be for them a great bounty from God, namely, Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When Allah's words (Lo! We have given thee (0 Muhammad) a signal victory, that Allah may forgive you of 478 your sins that which is past and that which is to come) [al-Fath, 48:1] were revealed the believers said: "Congratulations to you, Messenger of Allah, for being forgiven. But what do we get from Allah?" And so Allah said: (And announce) Muhammad (unto the believers the good tidings that they will have great bounty from Allah) an abundant reward in Paradise.
